NLP Pipeline

CLI Utilities (src/cli)

This module provides the main CLI interface for running the pipeline from the command line using argparse and typer.

Typer CLI

Modern CLI tool using [Typer](https://typer.tiangolo.com/):

  • –text for direct input

  • –file for batch processing

  • –lang for source language (e.g., “pl”)

Classic CLI

Emotion Classification CLI.

This CLI allows users to classify emotions from text, audio, or video inputs.

src.cli.main.audio(file: Path)[source]

Classify emotion from an audio file.

Parameters:

file (Path) – Path to the audio file (e.g., .mp3, .wav).

src.cli.main.save_mock_media_csv()[source]

Save a mock media prediction result to a CSV file.

Used when in MOCK_MODE for audio or video processing.

src.cli.main.save_mock_text_csv(text: str)[source]

Save a mock emotion prediction result from text input to a CSV file.

Parameters:

text (str) – Input text to mock-classify.

src.cli.main.text(input: str = <typer.models.ArgumentInfo object>)[source]

Classify emotion from a text input and save results.

Parameters:

input (str) – The input sentence or paragraph to classify.

src.cli.main.url(media_url: str, language: str = 'auto')[source]

Classify emotion from a media URL (e.g., YouTube, MP3 link).

Parameters:

  • media_url (str) – The media URL to process.

  • language (str) – Language of the media (default is ‘auto’).

src.cli.main.video(file: Path)[source]

Classify emotion from a video file.

Parameters:

file (Path) – Path to the video file (e.g., .mp4, .mov).

A legacy CLI using argparse, intended for scripted usage.

Legacy Prototype

Deprecated version retained for comparison/testing only.
